title: UK construction in longest downturn since early 2020; global bond sell-off eases – business live
summary: UK long-term borrowing costs have seen a decline, reflecting shifting economic conditions. This change could influence government spending and investment strategies. Market analysts are closely monitoring the trends for potential impacts on the broader economy.

title: Leaders gather for ‘Coalition of the Willing’ talks on Ukraine security guarantees – Europe live
summary: Emmanuel Macron announced that Europe is prepared to offer guarantees during a meeting in Paris today. The discussion signifies a commitment to strengthening European unity and support. This announcement comes amidst ongoing geopolitical challenges faced by the continent.

title: Tories demand tax fraud investigation into Angela Rayner – UK politics live
summary: The Deputy Prime Minister was informed on Monday that the stamp duty she paid for her £800,000 flat could be insufficient. This observation was made by a cabinet colleague. The situation raises questions about potential tax obligations.

title: Adelaide v Collingwood: 2025 AFL first qualifying final – live
summary: The 2025 finals series kicks off in Adelaide with a match between the top two teams on the ladder. Martin Pegan provides goal-by-goal updates. Fans can expect an exciting showdown as the playoffs begin.

title: NFL 2025 season predictions: will it be Mahomes, Jackson or Allen in the Super Bowl?
summary: The NFL season begins on Thursday, raising excitement for standout rookies and uncertainties around teams like Dallas regarding the Micah Parsons trade. Fans are eager to see which new players will shine on the field. Speculation also surrounds which team will ultimately claim the championship title this season.
